properties.name: Booker T. Washington State Park
properties.description: Posted by Cryantri The is a great location with trails easy enough for beginners without boring the experts

properties.name: Cherokee National Forest
properties.description: Posted by Cryantri Also known as Tanasi. This area offers single track with significant elevation changes and great flow.

properties.name: Clemson Experimental Forest
properties.description: Posted by Cryantri  This area is just minutes from Clemson SC. and is one of my favorite places in the region. Trails are fast for the most part, but tight in places. Great for all abilities.

properties.name: Dupont State Forest
properties.description: Posted by Cryantri Some of the most unique single track in the region. Trails here are a little more novice friendly than Pisgah. Make sure to ride the slick rock trails.

properties.name: Harrison Bay State Park
properties.description: Posted by Cryantri  Similar to Booker T. Washington State Park. This offers beginner friendly single track while still entertaining the expert rider.

properties.name: Haw Ridge Park
properties.description: Posted by Cryantri Haw Ridge Park near Oak Ridge, TN offers great single track with great convenience.

properties.name: Pisgah National Forest
properties.description: Posted by Cryantri Pisgah offers some of the most demanding, yet rewarding single track in the region.

properties.name: Prentice Cooper State Forest
properties.description: Posted by Cryantri Prentice Cooper offers miles and miles of fire roads with plenty of great scenery.

properties.name: Raccoon Mountain
properties.description: Posted by CryantriBrand new single track just minutes from downtown Chattanooga.

properties.name: U.S. National Whitewater Center
properties.description: Posted by CryantriThis new facility offers miles of trails as one of the several available activities at the National Whitewater Center. Check out their website to see what all is available. Great for a full day of activities.
